content: I'm putting together a presentation on CQRS & ES and wanted to include how FHIR would fit into this paradigm. Does anyone have any resources they'd recommend on this topic?
Here is a good overview of the patterns and their application to EHR systems https://www.infoq.com/articles/healthcare-emr-ehr

Much better, although far lengthier, descriptions of CQRS and Event Sourcing here...
https://www.scribd.com/doc/250737968/Architecting-dotnet-2nd-edition-pdf
Detailed analysis of how FHIR fits into these patterns, and the broader approach of Domain Driven Design, would make for an interesting research paper.

" Clearly, a balance must be stricken to maintain the fidelity (i.e. eventual consistency) of the read cache for this approach to be useful" - umm, yes. I'd love to see him try to take this idea to market
